turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 2011 French Open.
turn.1: What happened in the 2011 French Open?
turn.2: 2011 French Open The 2011 French Open was a tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts.
turn.3: Was there anything special about it?
turn.4: It was the 115th edition of the French Open, and the second Grand Slam event of the year.
turn.6: It took place at the Stade Roland Garros in Paris, France, from 22 May to 5 June 2011.
turn.8: Rafael Nadal successfully defended his 2010 title, defeating rival Roger Federer in the final to win his sixth French Open title.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Francesca Schiavone was narrowly unsuccessful in her title defence, being defeated by Li Na in the final.
turn.12: Li became the first female Asian to win a Grand Slam singles title.
